thread.title: Grateful Dead bassist Phil Lesh battling bladder cancer
thread.title_full: Grateful Dead bassist Phil Lesh battling bladder cancer

title: Grateful Dead bassist Phil Lesh battling bladder cancer
text: > Entertainment Grateful Dead bassist Phil Lesh battling bladder cancer FILE - This May 9, 2009 file photo bassist Phil Lesh performs with The Dead, performs at the Forum in the Inglewood section of Los Angeles. Lesh says he has been diagnosed with bladder cancer and is being treated in Arizona. The 75-year-old bassist announced his illness Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, on the Facebook page of his San Rafael restaurant and concert hall, Terrapin Crossroads. (AP Photo/Richard Vogel, File)
